Package org.turbogwt.mvp.databind.client.validation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ValidationFailureHandler
    Handler for invalid validation events.
    ValidationHandler
    This interface provides callbacks to handle validation events.
    Validator<T,F>
    Interface used to validate databind flushes from view.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EmailValidator<T>
    Validator for textual values that should follow the email pattern.
    RequiredValidator<T,F>
    Validator for non-null properties.
    Validation
    Object used as return of validations by Validator.
    ValidationMessage
    Object that holds a textual message for the user and a type for styling purposes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ValidationMessage.Type
    The message type is useful for styling user message.
